meanings.definition: Relating to the genetic makeup of an organism.
meanings.sent1: The genotypical traits of the puppy determined its fur color.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the genotypical characteristics of different plant species.
meanings.sent3: The genotypical similarities between the twins were striking.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic talent seemed to have a genotypical origin.
meanings.sent5: The genotypical differences between the two bird species were fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Involving or based on the genetic constitution of an individual.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the genotypical risks associated with the genetic disorder.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the genotypical factors can help in predicting certain diseases.
meanings.sent3: The genotypical puzzle of inheritance kept the geneticist intrigued.
meanings.sent4: His musical talent was like a genotypical gift from his ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The genotypical variations in the population were crucial for evolutionary studies.
